description: Describes the details of a DDoS attack.

parameters.name: AttackId
parameters.description: The unique identifier (ID) for the attack.

nested_items.name: AttackId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the attack.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the resource that was attacked.

nested_items.name: SubResources
nested_items.description: If applicable, additional detail about the resource being attacked, for example, IP address or URL.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The SubResource type.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the SubResource.

nested_items.name: AttackVectors
nested_items.description: The list of attack types and associated counters.

nested_items.name: VectorType
nested_items.description: The attack type, for example, SNMP reflection or SYN flood.

nested_items.name: VectorCounters
nested_items.description: The list of counters that describe the details of the attack.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The counter name.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum value of the counter for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Average
nested_items.description: The average value of the counter for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Sum
nested_items.description: The total of counter values for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: N
nested_items.description: The number of counters for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit of the counters.

nested_items.name: Counters
nested_items.description: The counters that describe the details of the attack.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The counter name.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum value of the counter for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Average
nested_items.description: The average value of the counter for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Sum
nested_items.description: The total of counter values for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: N
nested_items.description: The number of counters for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit of the counters.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time the attack started, in Unix time in seconds.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time the attack ended, in Unix time in seconds.

nested_items.name: AttackCounters
nested_items.description: List of counters that describe the attack for the specified time period.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The counter name.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum value of the counter for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Average
nested_items.description: The average value of the counter for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Sum
nested_items.description: The total of counter values for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: N
nested_items.description: The number of counters for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit of the counters.

nested_items.name: AttackProperties
nested_items.description: The array of objects that provide details of the Shield event.

nested_items.name: AttackLayer
nested_items.description: The type of Shield event that was observed. NETWORK indicates layer 3 and layer 4 events and APPLICATION indicates layer 7 events.

nested_items.name: AttackPropertyIdentifier
nested_items.description: Defines the Shield event property information that is provided. The WORDPRESS_PINGBACK_REFLECTOR and WORDPRESS_PINGBACK_SOURCE values are valid only for WordPress reflective pingback events.

nested_items.name: TopContributors
nested_items.description: Contributor objects for the top five contributors to a Shield event. A contributor is a source of traffic that Shield Advanced identifies as responsible for some or all of an event.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the contributor. The type of name that you'll find here depends on the AttackPropertyIdentifier setting in the AttackProperty where this contributor is defined. For example, if the AttackPropertyIdentifier is SOURCE_COUNTRY, the Name could be United States.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The contribution of this contributor expressed in  Protection units. For example 10,000.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit used for the Contributor Value property.

nested_items.name: Total
nested_items.description: The total contributions made to this Shield event by all contributors.

nested_items.name: Mitigations
nested_items.description: List of mitigation actions taken for the attack.

nested_items.name: MitigationName
nested_items.description: The name of the mitigation taken for this attack.
